org.placelab.util.ns1
Class Ns1Reader

java.lang.Object
  org.placelab.util.ns1.Ns1Reader
public class Ns1Reader
extends java.lang.Object

decode .ns1 binary files. see http://jakarta.apache.org/poi/hpsf/internals.html for some info on what we're up to. NS1 is Copyright (c) Marius Milner, April 2003, be nice.

readNs1FromStream

public static Ns1 readNs1FromStream(java.io.InputStream in,
                                    Ns1ErrorState err)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    java.util.zip.DataFormatException
read an ns1 file. if there is a data format error after the ns1 reading has begun, the existing ns1 will be returned, and err will be set to an error state. errors before the AP reading begins will except.

Parameters:
in - input stream to read from
err - the Ns1ErrorState to note errors to.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is an error reading from in
java.util.zip.DataFormatException - if in dosen't contain an understandable NS1 format
